website_summaries.verdict: With capable, speedy performance, and a friendly but powerful interface, the Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF5 is a good choice for people looking to upgrade from a point-and-shoot.
pros: Relatively compact for its class, the Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF5 delivers excellent performance and good-to-great photo quality
cons: The Power Zoom lens isn't great and there are some image-quality flaws in the JPEGs that might bother some people

customer_reviews.title: Great for Video
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases ever. I bought this used primarily for video, because of Panasonic's reputation for video. Took me a while before I started to do videos seriously at the gigs where I do still photography - but I now have got into the swing of things, and am shooting a lot of video - some of which are stunningly good in quality. The sound using only the camera's internal mics is good enough that a regular taper asked if it really was from the internal mics. Please see comments where I have included several YouTube links to videos from this camera
customer_reviews.author: Unknown Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear & Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my travels abroad, and so far it has been wonderful. It's very easy to use, the picture quality is great, and it's about the same size as my old point-and-shoot. I bought an extra two batteries, and I'm happy I did. I was a bit skeptical going from a series of Canon cameras to a Panasonic, but I've been very happy with my purchase. (And the Amazon Marketplace Deal was awesome!)
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Takes great photos and abuse
customer_reviews.text: I tested this out extensively before bringing it to France for a cycling trip. I forgot the battery at home though and could NOT find someone to sell me a replacement. Be warned the battery is hard to replace! Otherwise, the photos come out beautiful, even with only moderate knowledge of real photography. I'm a huge fan of the size and quality. Perfect for my use case.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Resident

customer_reviews.title: Great, love it!!
customer_reviews.text: A great micro 4/3 mirrorless camera!! Takes great pictures, has most needed settings (unfortunately no bulb) but is a small rugged camera. The battery seems to be good for over 300 shots. I love it and also some of the additional lenses are reasonably priced. Nice small package!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I recently got this for my wife, and I bought the Canon Rebel T4i for my mom. The Lumix actually does some pretty useful things the Rebel doesn't. For example, the popular effect where the photo is black and white except for a red balloon or a red dress- the Lumix will do that in real time. The Lumix has a bunch of preconfigured FX and settings that make it really easy to use. It's really tiny too. It's smaller than some point and shoot cameras I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: rolfe

customer_reviews.title: Performs better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a pretty decent micro 4/3 camera. It's angled towards the point and shoot camera crowd, but as long as you are okay with touchscreens you can get it set up to work well for the more technically inclined. Image quality is better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: cpl366

customer_reviews.title: Just about everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this camera for several months and waited for it to go on sale. Got a great Black Friday deal even though I had to wait a little while for it to get in stock - it was worth the wait. The zoom isn't as effective as on my other Panasonic - so I will probably order the zoom lens too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Campbell

customer_reviews.title: PANASONIC LUMIX DMC-GF5
customer_reviews.text: LIGHT WEIGHT, EXCELLENT PICTURES AND COMFORTABLE TO USE. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. THIS A RELATIVELY INEXPENSIVE CAMERA. ONE OF MY BETTER PURCHASES.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera to take pictures, not so much to record
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shots, excelent color, handy and fast. Cont: blur effect when filming (adjusting focus). I like take pictures, so the record issue is not important for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: It does its job
customer_reviews.text: Not so excellent as I have expected from my friend's review. But it's all right. Anyhow, It's much lighter and smalled than those SLR, and its pics are better than those point-and-shot. So, OK
customer_reviews.author: Hai Yang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera for the MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Pros: small, extremely fast focus, Vero neat manual focus feature, excellent light metering. perfect blend of point and shoot and slr. cons: only complaint is the zoom on the lens is to stiff. makes fine tuning your zoom difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zehentner

customer_reviews.title: only one word... AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is better than i expected. is very small and take amazing pictures, simple to use!. i recomended 100%
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Eduardo Jaramillo Londoño

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The delivery of product was smooth. My daughter is in love with her new camera.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Veenstra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love it we need to buy an extra battery pack though. It takes pics in a snap and I love the white color. We are going to buy a longer lens too
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Takes beautiful clear pictures. Very easy to use. It took a bit of getting used to after using those small digital cameras for do long, but it was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Danit

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic DMC- GF5KK Review
customer_reviews.text: Great camera so far. I have had it just a small amount f time, but the shots I have taken were great.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Fleming

customer_reviews.title: CAN HEAR ZOOM ON LENS ON VIDEO SOUND
customer_reviews.text: Excellent photos and crisp video. Easy to use for a beginner and more advanced photographer. Couldn't believe that you could hear the automatic zoom over the video sound when filming a video of a band concert. Very distracting. Would purchase again but without the automatic zoom because of the NOISE. Am very disappointed in this feature because it negates 50% of my video preferences. Would purchase again, but with manual zoom. Camera itself (minus the noise) is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera many usefull functions, lens is fantastic, the battery lasts long enough, shold come with a memory.
customer_reviews.author: minu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera that does what I need
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to a 20x zoom lens, so going back to a 14-42 standard lens felt very limiting, however it takes amazing photos / videos.
customer_reviews.author: Smitthy

customer_reviews.title: best camera ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, quality, portability etc. plus the pictures i get without being a photo professional. i highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Napoleon Camero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera for the money. I got mine deeply discounted as an Amazon warehouse deal. The product was marketed as "Used - Good Condition", but I could not find a blemish on it whatsoever. The camera has excellent image quality and far exceeds the image quality of a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: dalexander

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for a everyday carry around instead of the bulky DSLR. I find the picture quality to be more than satisfactory, colours are rendered very accurately and the focus is super fast and tack sharp. I would highly recommend this camera with the compact pancake lens 14-42mm
customer_reviews.author: D. Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend. She LOVES everything about it!!! If you're thinking about buying a camera of this type, don't hesitate on this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad pictures
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy taking pictures as a hobby. I used to own a Canon Rebel XS, and loved it! Except, it was too bulky for me. So, I sold it and purchased this Panasonic. The pictures don't compare at all to the Canon. Not as good. Very noticeable difference. Maybe I'm not using it correctly (I stick with the auto settings). But, after constant bad results, I actually sold it back to Amazon (they have a great buyback program). In hindsight, since the Canon was a DSLR, and the Panasonic a micro 4/3, this is what most likely caused the quality difference.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera to start
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very good, I was searching something who fit in the pocket with advance photography function. It match perfectly !! The touch screen is slow but you don't really need it if you customize your function touch.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: It has a high quality and very beautiful just as I imagination. And the packaging is very carefully. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Great Pictures for Novice use
customer_reviews.text: I went from a point and shoot little camera to this and have been very impressed. This camera takes nice pictures right out of the box and does all the focusing by itself. I am not a camera expert and have a very basic understanding of photography, but this camera makes life easy. It is very similiar to a point and shoot, but takes way better pictures. It capture the birth of our child fabulously and I could not be more happy with my purchase. A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: best camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best camera at best price. I love this camera. its so good and also Made in japan.
customer_reviews.author: tejas walke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smaller camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality in a small package. We were tired of lugging around our Nikon d5000 and huge lens when taking pics of the kids at the zoo, etc. This is a great small camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and Good-performance
customer_reviews.text: It's a small and exquisite camera but can produce beautiful picture. The battery can use for a whole day. I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

product_meta.title: Panasonic DMC-GF5KK 12 MP Mirrorless Digital Camera with 3-Inch Touch Screen and 14-42 Zoom Lens (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:14-42 Zoom LensFROM THE MANUFACTURER
 


LUMIX GF5
• Class Leading Fast Auto Focus [ * For Micro Four Thirds System Cameras as of April 5, 2012 ]
• Automatically Recommends Creative Effects with Guides
• Widest Range of Interchangeable Lens Available [ * For Micro Four Thirds System Cameras as of April 5, 2012 ]
• Smartphone-like Touch Enabled Display
• Professional Looking Stills and HD Videos



LOVE PHOTOGRAPHY?
Hidden within the sophisticated profile of this next generation [Mirrorless] ultra-compact interchangeable lens camera is the heart of today’s powerful DSLR cameras. The LUMIX DMC-GF5 features higher image quality even in under low light shooting with high ISO settings. The reason is the large newly developed 12.1 Megapixel Live MOS Sensor and advanced Image processing from the LUMIX Venus Engine. In addition to the basic features desired in DSLR cameras including quick accurate auto focus, DMC-GF5 features a host of options that make photography even more artistic yet easy – enjoyable enough for users seeking to step up from a compact digital camera. Complying with the established Micro Four Thirds “mirrorless” standard, the widest range of interchangeable lenses is offered to expand the photographic experience and your love of photography.


NEW 12.1-MEGAPIXEL LIVE MOS SENSOR AND VENUS ENGINE TRUE PICTURE QUALITY


The DMC-GF5 is a stylish camera in compact size thanks to the elimination of mirrors found in DSLR that were designed in the days of film. Yes it retains the fundamental excellent performance of an interchangeable lens system camera, only it was designed for the modern digital age. DMC-GF5 incorporates a newly developed 12.1-megapixel Live MOS (image sensor) which features high sensitivity signal processing. Optimization of on-chip filters realizes image recording with even higher sensitivity at max. ISO12800. Both photodiode circuit and readout circuit are also optimized to minimize noise generation through processing to readout. Furthermore, newly added NR (Noise Reduction) circuit completes Panasonic’s excellent noise reduction system that thoroughly removes noise left at final processing stage.






The image processor Venus Engine uses a combination of 3DNR(3D Noise Reduction) and MNR (Multi-process Noise Reduction), both bright area and dark area are faithfully reproduced with minimum noise in high sensitivity picture recording.


CLASS LEADING FAST AUTO FOCUS
All cameras of LUMIX G Micro System adopt Contrast AF for its focus system. Compared with the Phase difference system AF used in legacy DLSR cameras, the Contrast AF boasts higher accuracy.

The DMC-GF5 features the class leading**** ultra-high-speed (approx. 0.09 second) of Light Speed AF and high precision touch enabled pin-point AF that makes it possible to capture even the fast-moving subject clearly. Not only thanks to contrast based focus accuracy, but its speed also excels like that of traditional DSLRs with Phase difference.


Combined with the Touch AF control, setting and focusing at the subject is incredibly easy and quick, never missing the spur-of-the-moment. Taking further advantage of Contrast AF, the DMC-GF5 incorporates Full-area focusing which makes it possible to set focus on any point in the field of view. Frame composition is free and intuitive combining the touch-control operation.

The touch-control system of DMC-GF5 immediately lets users to set focus to the subject by just touching it on the LCD and you can even release the shutter. Once you lock on the subject by a touch, the camera tracks the subject with the AF tracking function even if it moves. Pinpoint AF function is incorporated in DMC-GF5 allowing more precise focus setting by further enlarging the focusing area. It assists, for example, setting focus right on the pupil in an eye.

* The time for focusing on the subject is measured with LUMIX G X VARIO PZ 14-42mm / F3.5-5.6 ASPH. / POWER O.I.S (H-PS14042) (bundled lens in DMC-GF5X) to move the lens position to "2m" from "infinity" position. The zoom position is in wide end. Panasonic measurement method

NEW SCENE GUIDE TO LEAN VARIOUS EXPRESSIONS IN PHOTOGRAPHY AND NEW CREATIVE CONTROL
For beginners of interchangeable lens system cameras, the new Scene Guide in DMC-GF5 offers 23 sample pictures shot by professional photographers. Users can choose the one closer to the situation they are going to shoot and optimum parameters for shooting the scene will be automatically set*. Furthermore, shooting procedure, technical advice and recommended interchangeable lens for the scene can be shown for users to learn photography.

The popular Creative Control mode is upgraded by increasing its filter option from 6 (for DMC-GF3) to 14 (for DMC-GF5) adding new Soft Focus**, Dynamic Monochrome, Impressive Art, One Point Color, Cross Process and Star Filter**, in addition to the conventional Expressive, Retro, High Key, Sepia, High Dynamic, Miniature Effect*** and newly added Low Key and Toy Effect mode. Effect parameter of each mode is also adjustable. With the new GUI and menu tab, switching filter effect is extremely easy and is possible to preview via the Live View. Also, recommended filters are suggested depending on the scene that camera detects in iA or iA Plus mode.

*Video recording using Scene Guise is not possible in some scenes.
**For photo only
*** Sound will not be recorded with [MINIATURE EFFECT] in Creative Control Mode and approximately 1/10 of the time period is recorded. (If you record for 10 minutes, the resulting motion picture recording will be approximately 1 minute long)


INTUITIVE CONTROL AND HIGH VISIBILITY ENABLED BY THE NEW 920,000-DOT TOUCH DISPLAY
With the new 3.0-inch large 920,000-dot high-precision touch display and GUI(Graphic User Interface), the DMC-GF5 offers both ease and comfort in operation.

The touch-control system immediately lets users to set focus to the subject by just touching it on the screen and you can even release the shutter. Once you lock on the subject by a touch, the camera tracks the subject with the AF tracking function even if it moves. Touch zoom is also available when the LUMIX Power Zoom Lens H-PS14042 lens or H-PS45175 is mounted. Taking further advantage of Contrast AF, the DMC-GF5 incorporates Full-area focusing which makes it possible to set focus on any point in the field of view. Frame composition is free and is intuitively determined. Also, menu of shooting option is available with Touch Q-menu. Operation is always quick and easy with DMC-GF5.

Thanks to the newly integrated graphic engine, GUI is now sophisticated in every detail and features animation for higher visibility. Users can choose an image and set it as a wallpaper on the back of menu screen like mobile phones.

ULTRA SMALL, LIGHT-WEIGHT BODY WITH BUILT-IN FLASH FEATURING SOPHISTICATED DESIGN AND ENJOYABLE OPERABILITY
The DMC-GF5 features ultimate compactness despite its incorporation of built-in flash. The design dispels impression for conventional big, heavy and colorless DSLRs. Although the round-form profile gives comfortable impression, its design is sophisticated and stylish. Aluminum ring surrounding metal mount surrounded refines the look even sharper. Finest tuning is applied in every part of the camera not just its look but also touch and even sense of feel.


HIGH QUALITY 1920 X 1080 FULL-HD VIDEO WITH STEREO SOUND
The DMC-GF5 can record 1920 x 1080 at 60i(NTSC) / 50i(PAL)* full-High Definition videos in the AVCHD format which excels in both compression efficiency and compatibility with AV equipment for playback. In addition to the practical full-time AF, the Touch AF in video recording also lets users enjoy professional-like rack focusing. With a dedicated video record button on the top, users can instantly start recording videos while shooting photos without any having to make any extra setting adjustments. Along with the full-HD video capabilities, the DMC-GF5 also features high-quality sound, recorded with Dolby® Digital Stereo Creator. Videos can also be recorded in MP4 format for playback on a PC or other portable electronic devices without having to convert the files. Also, the Extra Tele Conversion function virtually extends the zoom range Max. 4.2x without deterioration of image quality in smaller resolution.

-Maximum time to record motion pictures continuously with [AVCHD] is 29 minutes 59 seconds in European PAL areas.
-Maximum time to record motion pictures continuously with [MP4] is 29 minutes 59 seconds or up to 4 GB.
-You can check the recordable time on the screen. (For [FHD] in [MP4] format, the file size is large and so the recordable time will drop below 29 minutes 59 seconds.)

OTHER FEATURES COMPLETES DMC-GF5
Although the DMC-GF5 is a compact, stylish, interchangeable lens system camera, the DMC-GF5 is capable of high-speed burst shooting at 4 fps (in full resolution) to capture subject with motion.

For beginners of digital interchangeable lens system cameras, iA (Intelligent Auto) mode supports taking beautiful pictures with a variety of shooting-assist functions including AF Tracking, Intelligent D-range Control, Intelligent Scene Selector, Face Recognition and Intelligent ISO Control. The iA Plus mode lets users adjust defocusing area in the background, exposure compensation and white balance for more flexible control.

A dedicated sensor for shooting angle detection is newly added which makes it possible to tell whether the photo was taken horizontally or vertically whatever lens is used.

The DMC-GF5 is compatible with UHS-I standard for the SDXC/SDHC Memory Card taking its advantage of high-speed data transmission.

A Variety of optional accessories including Wide / Tele / Macro / Fisheye Conversion Lenses, fashionable straps and carrying cases makes it more fun to be with DMC-GF5.

[ **** For Micro Four Thirds System Cameras as of April 5, 2012 ]
feature_bullets: Widest Range of Interchangeable Lens Available for Micro Four Thirds System Cameras

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars49 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
